entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
